hanzi-su-wiki:
貿

Значения

Обмен; торговля

Мнемоника

Открывать ворота 卯 (сверху) обращению денег 貝. Свободная торговля, денежные операции.

Варианты

贸

purpleculture_examples: 貿易 [ mào yì ]: (commercial) trade; Classifiers: 个
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 卯 [ mǎo ] 4th terrestrial branch; period from 5-7 a.m.
    • 貝 [ bèi ] sea shell; money, currency
heisig_chinese_memo: There's a buyback program where you can trade in your dagger for money. But it's quite ineffective, since only registered dagger-owners with the original receipts can participate, and not criminals with illegally-purchased daggers.
heisig_constituent: trade, receipt, sword, dagger, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisig_story: Receipt . . . dagger . . . shells. Though the meanings are related, do not confuse with make a deal (Frame 471) or wholesale (Frame 1499).
koohiiStory1: There´s a buyback program where you can trade in your dagger for money. But it´s quite ineffective, since only registered dagger-owners with the original receipts can participate, and not criminals with illegally-purchased daggers.
koohiiStory2: The new RANSOM note (a receipt stuck to a door with a dagger) from DETAIN (1423) appears again (probably after you went to the field as instructed) now gives instruction to TRADE the victim for CURRENCY you were told to bring.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You send your private sword man out with your shellfish so he can trade them. Shellfish were used as currency back in the olden days. And you aren't going to go out trading and dirty your own hands, no no. Trading your shellfish is the job for the private sword you hired!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine your private sword holding a big bag of shellfish and going off to market to trade them.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: While he's out making the trade for you, you decide to relax and do some bowling (ぼう). In fact, you can't wait for the trade to be done because you're hoping he's going to come back with a new bowling ball for you.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Oh boy, I hope my private sword trades my shellfish for that new bowling ball I heard about!
Ru_Radicals: ハ, 刀 (катана), 厶 (значок МУ), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
Ru_trainchinese: mào: (графема) сделка, обмен; без тщательного обдумывания
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the shellfish (貝) and the hare (卯) trade
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: There's a buyback program where you can trade in your dagger for shells (money). But it's quite ineffective since only registered dagger owners with the original receipts can participate, and not criminals with illegally-purchased daggers.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " Bei " and "卯", the original meaning is transaction and trading. "Shuowen": "Yi Caiye. Congbei, Maosheng." "Poetry·Weifeng·Meng": "The chichi of the gangster, hug cloth trade silk." Zhu Xi's collection: "Trade, buy also." Gao Heng Note: "Trade, Exchange."

" Trade " can mean change and change. The Southern Dynasties Liang Xiaotong’s "Answers to the Book of the King of Jin'an": "The beginning of trade in the flaming and cool climates was a great excitement."

" Trade " also means interaction and complexity. Southern Song Pei Qi's "Preface to the Collection of Historical Records": "The one who is puzzled by the world will determine the other from now on. It is a non-communicative trade, the authenticity is mixed."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " Bei " and "卯", the original meaning is transaction and sale.
humanum_full_description:
從「貝」，「卯」聲，本義為交易、買賣。《說文》：「易財也。从貝，卯聲。」 《詩‧衛風‧氓》：「氓之蚩蚩，抱布貿絲。」朱熹集傳：「貿，買也。」高亨注：「貿，交換。」

　　「貿」可表示變換、改變。南朝梁蕭統《答晉安王書》：「炎涼始貿，觸興自高。」

　　「貿」還表示交互、錯雜。南朝宋裴駰《〈史記集解〉序》：「而世之惑者，定彼從此，是非相貿，真偽舛雜。」
humanum_short_description: 從「貝」，「卯」聲，本義為交易、買賣。

貿易(ぼうえき): trade

從「 貝 」，「 卯 」聲，本義為交易、買賣。《說文》：「易財也。从貝，卯聲。」 《詩‧衛風‧氓》：「氓之蚩蚩，抱布貿絲。」朱熹集傳：「貿，買也。」高亨注：「貿，交換。」 「 貿 」可表示變換、改變。南朝梁蕭統《答晉安王書》：「炎涼始貿，觸興自高。」 「 貿 」還表示交互、錯雜。南朝宋裴駰《〈史記集解〉序》：「而世之惑者，定彼從此，是非相貿，真偽舛雜。」
From the sound of " Bei" and " 卯", the original meaning is transaction and trading. "Shuowen": "Yi Caiye. Congbei, Maosheng." "Poetry·Weifeng·Meng": "The chichi of the gangster, hug cloth trade silk." Zhu Xi's collection: "Trade, buy also." Gao Heng Note: "Trade, Exchange." " Trade" can mean change and change. The Southern Dynasties Liang Xiaotong’s "Answers to the Book of the King of Jin'an": "The beginning of trade in the flaming and cool climates was a great excitement." " Trade" also means interaction and complexity. Southern Song Pei Qi's "Preface to the Collection of Historical Records": "The one who is puzzled by the world will determine the other from now on. It is a non-communicative trade, the authenticity is mixed."

貿字的基本解释

貿
mào
见“贸”。

貿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mào］
［《廣韻》莫候切，去候，明。］
“贸1”的繁体字。亦作“1”。
(1)交易，买卖。
(2)变换；改变。
(3)交互；错杂。
(4)轻率地，不加考虑地。参见“貿然”。
[②]［móu］
［《集韻》迷浮切，平矦，明。］
“贸2”的繁体字。亦作“2”。
(1)目眩。参见“貿2貿”。
(2)昏昧，昏庸。
(3)通“侔”。等齐。
(4)通“牟”。谋取。

貿字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　貿； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1207第08
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?莫?切，音茂。【說文】作?。易財也。【徐曰】?，猶亂也，交互之義。【五經文字】?，經典相承，隷省作貿。【爾雅·釋言】貿，市也。又買也。【詩·衞風】抱布貿絲。　又【禮·檀弓】有餓者，蒙袂輯屨，貿貿然來。【註】貿貿，目不明之貌。【釋文】貿，一音牟。　又【廣雅】貿，敭也。　又姓。【廣韻】出《姓苑》，東莞人氏。　又通茅。【公羊傳·成元年】敗績于貿戎。【釋文】貿，一音茅。《左氏傳》作茅戎。

貿字的源字形

金文楷体

[①]［mào］
["Guangyun" Do not wait to cut, go to wait, Ming. ]
The traditional characters of "trade 1". Also called "1".
(1) Trading, buying and selling.
(2) Transformation; change.
(3) Interaction; miscellaneous.
(4) Recklessly, without consideration. See "hastily".
[②]［móu］
["Ji Yun" fan floating cut, flat 矦, Ming. ]
The traditional characters of "Trade 2". Also called "2".
(1) Dazzling. See "Trade 2 Trade".
(2) Faint and faint.
(3) Through "Yu". Wait.
(4) Through "Mou". seek.

mào
вм. 贸
Radicals: ム, 刀, 貝  (private, sword, shellfish)
Meaning Mnemonic
You send your private sword man out with your shellfish so he can trade them. Shellfish were used as currency back in the olden days. And you aren't going to go out trading and dirty your own hands, no no. Trading your shellfish is the job for the private sword you hired!
Imagine your private sword holding a big bag of shellfish and going off to market to trade them.
Reading Mnemonic
While he's out making the trade for you, you decide to relax and do some bowling (ぼう). In fact, you can't wait for the trade to be done because you're hoping he's going to come back with a new bowling ball for you.
Oh boy, I hope my private sword trades my shellfish for that new bowling ball I heard about!
